Augment.Name: Aspect of Air II
Augment.Description: Air Guard: This Weapon stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the user of this weapon is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds. Air:Air:Air

Augment.Name: Aspect of Earth II
Augment.Description: Earthgrab Guard: This item stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place. Earth:Earth:Earth

Augment.Name: Aspect of Fire II
Augment.Description: Incineration Guard: This item stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this destructive power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage. Fire:Fire:Fire

Augment.Name: Aspect of Water II
Augment.Description: Crushing Wave Guard: This item stores the unstoppable force of the ocean's fury deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, crushing enemies beneath a torrent of frigid water. Water:Water:Water

Augment.Name: Aspect of Positive Energy II
Augment.Description: Greater Disruption Guard: This Item stores a holy and righteous power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee by undead, this power occasionally comes to the surface, annihilating enemy undead. Positive:Positive:Positive

Augment.Name: Aspect of Negative Energy II
Augment.Description: Slay Living Guard: This item stores a dark and sinister power deep within. When the wearer of this is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to instantly snuff out the life force of the enemy. Negative:Negative:Negative

Augment.Name: Aspect of Ice II
Augment.Description: Freezing Ice Guard: This item stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice. Air:Water:Air+Water

Augment.Name: Aspect of Lightning II
Augment.Description: Lightning Storm Guard: This item stores the power of a volatile thunderstorm deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this dynamic power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with a massive lightning strike. Air:Positive:Air+Positive

Augment.Name: Aspect of Vacuum II
Augment.Description: Trap the Soul Guard: This item stores an overwhelming, merciless power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, sucking out the life force of an enemy and imprisoning the essence of their body and soul in a gem. Air:Negative:Air+Negative

Augment.Name: Tempered II
Augment.Description: Elemental Mastery Guard: This item is imbued with the energy of elemental mastery. Where the forces of the elements converge in harmony, each is equally potent. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, there is a chance that the attacker will take 1d6 of any or all of the following elemental damage types: acid, electric, fire and cold. Fire:Water:Earth+Air

Augment.Name: Aspect of Mineral II
Augment.Description: Protection +5 and Fortification +100% Earth:Positive:Earth+Positive

Augment.Name: Aspect of Dust II
Augment.Description: Disintegration Guard: This item has a store of dark, insidious power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally lashes out violently at enemies and attempts to disintegrate them. Earth:Negative:Earth+Negative

Augment.Name: Aspect of Smoke II
Augment.Description: Smoke Screen: You are surrounded by wisps of concealing smoke, giving opponents a 20% concealment chance to miss you. Air:Fire:Fire+Air

Augment.Name: Aspect of Magma II
Augment.Description: Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heart of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, slowing an enemy down and inflicting massive fire damage over time. Earth:Fire:Fire+Earth

Augment.Name: Aspect of Radiance II
Augment.Description: Radiance Guard: This item is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, the attacker has a chance of being hit by 4d6 points of light damage and has a chance of being blinded. Fire:Positive:Fire+Positive

Augment.Name: Aspect of Ash II
Augment.Description: Enervation Guard: This item stores a menacing, ravenous power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, draining the life force of the enemy and giving negative levels. Fire:Negative:Fire+Negative

Augment.Name: Aspect of Ooze II
Augment.Description: Sundering Ooze Guard: This item stores the corrosive, voracious power of the ooze deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power can come to the surface, decreasing an opponents AC, and occasionally summoning a wild ooze that will fight against your enemies. Earth:Water:Water+Earth

Augment.Name: Balance of Land and Sky II
Augment.Description: Elemental Mastery Guard: This item is imbued with the energy of elemental mastery. Where the forces of the elements converge in harmony, each is equally potent. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, there is a chance that the attacker will take 1d6 of any or all of the following elemental damage types: acid, electric, fire and cold. Air:Earth:Water+Fire

Augment.Name: Aspect of Steam II
Augment.Description: Steam Guard: This item is constantly building a magical steam within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this pressure can be violently discharged, periodically damaging the enemy with an additional 2d8 plus 8 points of untyped damage. Water:Positive:Water+Positive

Augment.Name: Aspect of Salt II
Augment.Description: Corrosive Salt Guard: This item stores a caustic, insatiable power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power can come to the surface in the form of a noxious, corrosive salt that dissolves all substances. Water:Negative:Water+Negative

Augment.Name: Existential Stalemate II
Augment.Description: Concordant Opposition: This item is imbued with the energy of concordant opposition. Those who rest at the pinnacle of supreme balance can do nothing but gain. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, there is a chance the item will bestow temporary hit points and grant spell points to the wearer. Negative:Positive:Positive+Negative

Augment.Description: TBD Water:Opposition:Material
